title: Strummer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, you may play a song at someone's house. You will redirect all their visitors to a second target of your choice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- After a Countryfolk player is hanged, tonight your songs will be filled with strange noises. All visitors you redirect will have vulnerable defense for the night.
- RB and control immune
- Retain your Background upon being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.

desc:
Post 4724
*Devil said he'd teach me to play this here guitar in exchange for my soul, but said I ain't have to sell my soul if I paid up in other sums.*
